Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechanical problem on the train. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier mechanical problem on the train.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute at Harrison/Laramie
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Central, Jackson, Cicero, and Harrison due to, street blockage near Harrison/Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Central, Jackson, Cicero, and Harrison due to, street blockage near Harrison/Laramie.

Allow extra travel time.
